Text:
Subtitles are in english?
Txs for sharing.

Hello there! 
For some strange reason on VLC even, there is no audio. This is the first after hundreds if not thousands of films/clips that I cannot access audio. 
It would seem unlikely that this is a codec issue, but can somebody - or the torrent poster acosmic, confirm there is a problem or not? Or offer a solution if they know of one? 
I would be ever so grateful.

Ignore me! 
I just realized it's in 5.1 but vlc seems only able to accept the side channels - turned vlc to stereo and presto.
So ignore me.
